content:
Switzerland | 30.03.2024 | Kulturfabrik Zürich successfully concluded by making the 5th Koge of the member with the majority of members on Sunday (March 17th),

Following the selection and agenda of the members of the Court to manage the congress, 4, period activity, financial reports and 5 period perspective report were read and presented to the approval of the members participating in the congress. It was important for each member who spoke with the criticism-private approach of past activities by adding himself into it.

The perspective report was emphasized and the report was given in September 2023, which is also recommended in the report"You are not alone, organizing-organization"In the new period of the campaign"Institutionalization, massization"to continue in the form of the congress decision was accepted.

Expanding the commissions established by making decisions in previous congresses."With immigrants and refugees"Considering the necessity of a more effective use of a relevant commission,"Press-Press-Social Media"The establishment of the commission was decided.

Following the completion of the discussion, suggestions and proposals, the congress was successful with the election of the members of the new management and supervisory board for the 5th term.
title: KULTURFABRİK ZÜRich held the 5th General Assembly
